methods.name: public Builder setAvailability(@Availability int availability)
methods.comment:
* Sets the availability of the conversation to provide a hint about how likely
         * it is that the user would receive a timely response if they sent a message.

methods.name: public Builder setDescription(@Nullable CharSequence description)
methods.comment:
* Sets a user visible description expanding on the conversation user(s)'s activity. * *

Examples include: what media someone is watching or listening to, their approximate * location, or what type of anniversary they are celebrating.

methods.name: public Builder setIcon(@Nullable Icon icon)
methods.comment:
* Sets an image representing the conversation user(s)'s activity. * *

Examples include: A still from a new story update, album art, or a map showing * approximate location.

methods.name: public Builder setStartTimeMillis(long startTimeMs)
methods.comment: * Sets the time at which this status became valid.

methods.name: public Builder setEndTimeMillis(long endTimeMs)
methods.comment:
* Sets an expiration time for this status. * *

The system will remove the status at this time if it hasn't already been withdrawn. *
